page.title: 19HOLTON AREA ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: Theatre:The Broadbent Theatre, Wickenby - a converted Methodist Chapel seats 100 people & is run by The Lindsey Rural Players, an amateur company but it has many visiting professional companies and musicians. Holton Beckering & District Women's Institute meets monthly in the Hall at Holton & draws members from nearby villages. The White Hart at Lissington, a public house with restaurant includes a bar with pool table, juke box & darts, bringing in people from a wide area. Special events include the Wickenby Register when men stationed here during the war return annually for a reunion Dinner & a Religious Service at the Airfield. The Burton Fox Hunt meet at the White Hart with a large following of supporters.
